products.title: Modern Wooden Chair
products.description: A handcrafted wooden chair made with sustainable oak wood, designed to bring a touch of elegance and comfort to your living space. Perfect for both modern and traditional interiors.

products.title: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: Experience immersive sound with our latest wireless Bluetooth headphones, featuring active noise cancellation, 40-hour battery life, and ultra-soft ear cushions for long-lasting comfort.

products.title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
products.description: This double-walled stainless steel water bottle keeps your beverages cold for up to 24 hours and hot for up to 12. It's leakproof, BPA-free, and ideal for work, travel, or workouts.

products.title: Minimalist Wall Clock
products.description: A sleek and minimalist wall clock designed with a noiseless quartz mechanism. Its matte black frame and simple numeric design make it a stylish addition to any room.

products.title: Luxury Cotton Bedsheet Set
products.description: Upgrade your sleep with our premium 100% cotton bedsheet set, featuring a soft sateen finish. Includes 1 flat sheet, 1 fitted sheet, and 2 pillowcases. Breathable, durable, and machine washable.

products.title: Ergonomic Office Chair
products.description: Designed for productivity and comfort, this ergonomic office chair includes lumbar support, a breathable mesh back, and adjustable height and tilt settings. Ideal for long work hours.
